item.title: The Figure Shortcode
item.description: Hugo has figure shortcode built-in, so you can easily add figure captions or hyperlink rel attributes to images. Documentations can be found here: https://gohugo.io/content-management/shortcodes/#figure This theme has 3 CSS classes made for figure elements: big: images will break the width limit of main content area. left: images will float to the left.
